description.zh-cn: 香港一个已解散的保守派政党，属于建制派，由谭惠珠等人创立于1985年，并于1990年合并入香港自由民主联会。
description.en: A disbanded conservative political party in Hong Kong, part of the pro-establishment camp, founded by Maria Tam and others in 1985 and merged into the Hong Kong Liberal Democratic Federation in 1990.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，香港励进会的创办人及主席。
description.en: A Hong Kong politician, founder and chairperson of the Progressive Hong Kong Society.

description.zh-cn: 香港商人，香港励进会的共同创办人及副主席。
description.en: A Hong Kong businessman, co-founder and vice-chairman of the Progressive Hong Kong Society.

description.zh-cn: 香港一个已解散的亲建制派政党，由香港励进会等团体于1990年合并而成。
description.en: A disbanded pro-establishment political party in Hong Kong, formed in 1990 by the merger of the Progressive Hong Kong Society and other groups.

description.zh-cn: 香港工商派政治人物，曾为香港励进会成员。
description.en: A Hong Kong politician from the business sector, formerly a member of the Progressive Hong Kong Society.

description.zh-cn: 香港工商派政治人物，曾为香港励进会成员。
description.en: A Hong Kong politician from the business sector, formerly a member of the Progressive Hong Kong Society.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，曾任香港行政长官，为香港励进会成员及执行委员会委员。
description.en: A Hong Kong politician and former Chief Executive of Hong Kong, who was a member and Executive Committee member of the Progressive Hong Kong Society.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政府与大不列颠及北爱尔兰联合王国政府就香港问题共同发表的声明，其签署为香港励进会的成立提供了政治背景。
description.en: A joint declaration signed by the governments of the People's Republic of China and the United Kingdom on the Hong Kong question, the signing of which provided the political context for the establishment of the Progressive Hong Kong Society.

description.zh-cn: 香港商人，香港励进会的共同创办人及秘书。
description.en: A Hong Kong businessman, co-founder and secretary of the Progressive Hong Kong Society.

description.zh-cn: 香港励进会的共同创办人，曾任财政及副主席。
description.en: Co-founder of the Progressive Hong Kong Society, served as treasurer and vice-chairman.

description.zh-cn: 香港励进会执行委员会委员。
description.en: Executive Committee member of the Progressive Hong Kong Society.

description.zh-cn: 香港励进会执行委员会委员。
description.en: Executive Committee member of the Progressive Hong Kong Society.

description.zh-cn: 香港励进会执行委员会委员。
description.en: Executive Committee member of the Progressive Hong Kong Society.

description.zh-cn: 香港早期的政党之一，曾与香港励进会建立紧密关系。
description.en: One of the earliest political parties in Hong Kong, which established a close relationship with the Progressive Hong Kong Society.

description.zh-cn: 香港的政治派系之一，与建制派在政治立场上存在竞争关系。
description.en: A political faction in Hong Kong, which competes with the pro-establishment camp on political stances.

description.zh-cn: 1988年举行的香港区议会选举，香港励进会在此次选举中取得重要成果。
description.en: The 1988 Hong Kong District Board elections, in which the Progressive Hong Kong Society achieved significant results.

description.zh-cn: 香港励进会成员，曾任副主席。
description.en: Member of the Progressive Hong Kong Society, served as vice-chairman.

description.zh-cn: 香港励进会成员，曾任副主席。
description.en: Member of the Progressive Hong Kong Society, served as vice-chairman.

description.zh-cn: 香港建筑师，香港励进会成员及执行委员会委员。
description.en: A Hong Kong architect, member and Executive Committee member of the Progressive Hong Kong Society.

description.zh-cn: 1988年举行的香港立法局选举，香港励进会在此次选举后成为立法局第一大党。
description.en: The 1988 Hong Kong Legislative Council election, after which the Progressive Hong Kong Society became the largest party in the Legislative Council.

description.zh-cn: 香港的政治派系之一，通常指立场亲中国共产党及香港特别行政区政府的政党和人士。
description.en: A political faction in Hong Kong, generally referring to political parties and individuals who are aligned with the Communist Party of China and the HKSAR Government.

description.zh-cn: 一种政治意识形态，是香港励进会的指导思想。
description.en: A political ideology that served as the guiding principle for the Progressive Hong Kong Society.

description.zh-cn: 协助香港行政长官决策的最高级行政机构。
description.en: The highest-level executive body that assists the Chief Executive of Hong Kong in policy-making.

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区的立法机关。
description.en: The legislature of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

description.zh-cn: 香港励进会成员。
description.en: Member of the Progressive Hong Kong Society.

description.zh-cn: 香港励进会成员。
description.en: Member of the Progressive Hong Kong Society.

description.en: Member of the Progressive Hong Kong Society.

description.en: Member of the Progressive Hong Kong Society.

description.en: Member of the Progressive Hong Kong Society.

description.en: Member of the Progressive Hong Kong Society.

description.en: Member of the Progressive Hong Kong Society.

description.en: Member of the Progressive Hong Kong Society.

description.en: Member of the Progressive Hong Kong Society.

description.en: Member of the Progressive Hong Kong Society.

description.en: Member of the Progressive Hong Kong Society.

description.en: Member of the Progressive Hong Kong Society.

description.en: Member of the Progressive Hong Kong Society.

description.en: Member of the Progressive Hong Kong Society.

description.en: Member of the Progressive Hong Kong Society.

description.zh-cn: 香港励进会成员。
description.en: Member of the Progressive Hong Kong Society.

description.zh-cn: 香港励进会成员。
description.en: Member of the Progressive Hong Kong Society.

description.zh-cn: 谭惠珠是香港励进会的创办人。
description.en: Maria Tam was the founder of the Progressive Hong Kong Society.

description.zh-cn: 郭志权是香港励进会的共同创办人之一。
description.en: Kwok Chi-kuen was one of the co-founders of the Progressive Hong Kong Society.

description.zh-cn: 浦炳荣是香港励进会的共同创办人之一。
description.en: Poon Ping-wing was one of the co-founders of the Progressive Hong Kong Society.

description.zh-cn: 郭志桁是香港励进会的共同创办人之一。
description.en: Kwok Chi-hang was one of the co-founders of the Progressive Hong Kong Society.

description.zh-cn: 《中英联合声明》的签署为香港政制改革和香港励进会的成立创造了条件。
description.en: The signing of the Sino-British Joint Declaration created the conditions for Hong Kong's political reforms and the establishment of the Progressive Hong Kong Society.

description.zh-cn: 香港励进会是香港建制派的一个政党。
description.en: The Progressive Hong Kong Society was a political party within the pro-establishment camp in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 香港励进会的意识形态是保守主义。
description.en: The ideology of the Progressive Hong Kong Society was conservatism.

description.zh-cn: 香港励进会于1990年11月6日解散，并合并入香港自由民主联会。
description.en: The Progressive Hong Kong Society was disbanded on November 6, 1990, and merged into the Hong Kong Liberal Democratic Federation.

description.zh-cn: 谭惠珠于1990年参与创立了香港自由民主联会。
description.en: Maria Tam co-founded the Hong Kong Liberal Democratic Federation in 1990.

description.zh-cn: 香港励进会曾与香港公民协会建立了紧密的合作关系。
description.en: The Progressive Hong Kong Society established a close cooperative relationship with the Hong Kong Civic Association.

description.zh-cn: 香港励进会与泛民主派议员在政治上展开竞争。
description.en: The Progressive Hong Kong Society competed politically with members of the pro-democracy camp.

description.zh-cn: 香港励进会在1988年区议会选举中派出49人参选，其中41人当选，显著提升了其政治影响力。
description.en: In the 1988 District Board elections, the Progressive Hong Kong Society fielded 49 candidates, 41 of whom were elected, significantly boosting its political influence.

description.zh-cn: 香港励进会在1988年立法局选举的间接选举中赢得八个议席，成为立法局中的第一大党。
description.en: In the 1988 Legislative Council election, the Progressive Hong Kong Society won eight seats in the indirect elections, becoming the largest party in the Legislative Council.

description.zh-cn: 在创立励进会时，谭惠珠身兼行政局议员。
description.en: At the time of founding the Progressive Hong Kong Society, Maria Tam was a member of the Executive Council.

description.zh-cn: 在创立励进会时，谭惠珠身兼立法局议员。
description.en: At the time of founding the Progressive Hong Kong Society, Maria Tam was a member of the Legislative Council.
